programme.desc: Προηµιτελική Φάση. Το ιταλικό πρωτάθλημα μπάσκετ ετοιμάζεται να μας δώσει μια συναρπαστική νέα σεζόν. Η πρωταθλήτρια Αρμάνι Μιλάνου και η Βίρτους Μπολόνια θα εξακολουθήσουν να παλεύουν για τον τίτλο ή θα πρέπει να περιμένουμε εκπλήξεις; Θα το μάθουμε τον Ιούνιο.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: ACB Liga Endesa 2023-24
programme.desc: 34η αγωνιστική. Το κορυφαίο ισπανικό πρωτάθλημα μπάσκετ διαθέτει ευρωπαϊκές υπερδυνάμεις όπως οι Ρεάλ Μαδρίτης, Μπασκόνια, Γκραν Κανάρια, Ουνικάχα Μάλαγα, αλλά και η πρωταθήτρια Μπαρσελόνα. Συνολικά 18 ομάδες διεκδικούν τον τίτλο, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των νεοφώτιστων Ανδόρα και Παλένσια.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: NBA 2023-24
programme.desc: Playoffs. Τα πλέι οφ που ανακεφαλαιώνουν τη σεζόν 2023-24 στο ΝΒΑ ξεκινούν στις 20 Απριλίου και ολοκληρώνονται με τους Τελικούς. 16 ομάδες, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των πρωταθλητών Ντένβερ Νάγκετς, συμμετέχουν στην postseason.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Turkish Basketball Super League 2023-24
programme.desc: Προηµιτελική Φάση. Φενέρμπαχτσε και Αναντολού Εφές προβάλλουν ως φαβορί για τον τίτλο στην 58η σεζόν του τουρκικού πρωταθλήματος μπάσκετ, όπου συμμετέχουν συνολικά 16 ομάδες. Μπόντρουμσπορ και Σάμψουνσπορ είναι οι νεοφώτιστες, ενώ έως και 11 ομάδες μπορούν να εξασφαλίσουν ευρωπαϊκό εισιτήριο.

programme.title: Rallycross 2023
programme.desc: Χονγκ Κονγκ Ι (Ημιτελικός & Τελικός World RX1). Το FIA World Rallycross ξεκινά μια ακόμη συναρπαστική σεζόν, προσφέροντας καθαρή δράση. Το αγώνισμα που συνδυάζει άσφαλτο και χαλίκι επιστρέφει με θεαματικά οχήματα άνω των 600 ίππων και με την υψηλότερη επιτάχυνση στον κόσμο. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Μάριος Παπαδόπουλος.

programme.title: Πολεμικές Τέχνες: UFC Fight Night 2024
programme.desc: Σεντ Λούις, ΗΠΑ. Το καράτε ανταγωνίζεται το κουνγκ φου και το μποξ το ζίου ζίτσου. Το κικ μποξ έρχεται αντιμέτωπο με το τζούντο και η πάλη με το μάι τάι. Η 'μάχη' μεταξύ των πολεμικών τεχνών και η ανάδειξη του 'απόλυτου πρωταθλητή' μόνο στα κανάλια COSMOTE SPORT. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Γάτσης.

programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today

programme.title: Live: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: E60
programme.desc: ESPN's morning sports magazine show, featuring the biggest names and stories in sports.

programme.title: Live: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle
programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: The Hoop Collective
programme.desc: Brian Windhorst is joined by Tim MacMahon, Tim Bontemps, and other insiders to sort out life in and around the NBA world.

programme.title: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: Live: The Point
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship hockey show featuring highlights, news, analysis, speed, skill and access to the biggest stars, stories and personalities of the game. Hosted by John Buccigross.

programme.title: Full Court Press
programme.desc: Caitlin Clark, Kiki Rice, and Kamilla Cardoso return home, where their basketball dreams began, as the 2023-2024 women's college basketball season starts with unprecedented expectations.

programme.title: Full Court Press
programme.desc: Discussing the latest news and events in the worlds of professional and amateur hoops.

programme.title: Full Court Press
programme.desc: At the close of the regular season, Kiki Rice begins embracing her confidence and growing leadership of the UCLA Bruins. All eyes are on Caitlin Clark's record-breaking performances, while Kamilla Cardoso receives a heartwarming surprise.

programme.title: Full Court Press
programme.desc: As top seeds in the tournament, Iowa and South Carolina aim to return to the Final Four. After the season, Kiki Rice focuses on the future with UCLA while Caitlin Clark and Kamilla Cardoso take center stage at the WNBA Draft.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.sub-title: Carolina Hurricanes at New York Rangers
programme.desc: The Hurricanes visit the Rangers for Game 5 of this Eastern Conference semifinal. Carolina lived to see another day with a 4-3 triumph in Game 4. Former New York defenseman Brady Skjei (CAR) scored the winning goal with under four minutes to play.

programme.desc: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following each NBA telecast on TNT, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.

programme.title: Inside the NBA
programme.desc: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following each NBA telecast on TNT, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. It's a mix of highlights, interviews and hijinks, notably the verbal sparring sessions between the outspoken Barkley and his straight man, Smith. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta
programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: Košarka - Litvanska liga: Playoffs - 1/4 Finale (G1): Wolves - Neptunas
programme.desc: U ovoj zemlji, košarka je religija. Žalgiris je "dežurni krivac", ali nikada ne otpisujte klubove kao što su Ritas i Lijetkabelis.

programme.title: Fudbal (Ž) - Kup Azije U17: Australia - Thailand
programme.desc: Pratite "Kup Azije" za timove mlađe od 17 godina. Takmičenje za ženske nacionalne timove Azije osnovano je 2002. godine.

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Trenuci koji će zauvek ostati upisani u istoriji sporta. Koševi, golovi i dostignuća koja su uvek neiscrpna tema među ljubiteljima sporta...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Bilbao - Barcelona
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Chelsea TV: Nottingham Forest - Chelsea (PL)
programme.desc: Čelzi TV vas vodi kroz sve zanimljivosti sa Stamford Bridža, uživajte u svim utakmicama ovog engleskog velikana bogate prošlosti.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (Ž): Bulgaria - Holland
programme.desc: Ženska odbojkaška Liga nacija je takmičenje reprezentacija osnovano 2018. godine. 16 reprezentacija bori se za titulu prvaka. (LIVE).

programme.title: Galerija slavnih & SK Mix
programme.desc: Galerija slavnih & SK Mix.

programme.title: Pregled turske lige
programme.desc: Bešiktaš može da se hvali šampionskom titulom, ali Trabzon, Galatasaraj i Fenerbahče su se ozbiljno pojačali i svi misle da mogu do trofeja. Čini se da će biti napeto do poslednjeg kola.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (Ž): Italy - Poland
programme.desc: Ženska odbojkaška Liga nacija je takmičenje reprezentacija osnovano 2018. godine. 16 reprezentacija bori se za titulu prvaka. (LIVE).

programme.title: Sporthing & Moja priča
programme.desc: Sporthing & Moja priča.

programme.title: 50 godina sporta
programme.desc: Kako su se sport i sportisti razvijali tokom godina kroz oko moderne tehnologije. Ko je kada rođen i šta je sve postigao. Saznajte činjenice koje možda niste znali o svom omiljenom igraču ili vozaču.

programme.title: Pregled Bundeslige
programme.desc: Uz sve ono što nam je Nemačka podarila kroz istoriju ponosno stoji i Bundesliga. Najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja osnovanog 1963. godine broji 18 ekipa koje svakog avgusta kreću u trku za popularnim...

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (Ž): China - South - Korea
programme.desc: Ženska odbojkaška Liga nacija je takmičenje reprezentacija osnovano 2018. godine. 16 reprezentacija bori se za titulu prvaka. (LIVE).

programme.title: SK Moments & Zlatni momenti YU sporta
programme.desc: SK Moments & Zlatni momenti YU sporta.

programme.title: E-Sports: League of Legends - EMEA Masters
programme.desc: EU Masters je vrhunski, evropski, poluprofesionalni turnir na kom učestvuju najbolji e-sport timovi iz svake zemlje.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Estoril - Sporting
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Darmstadt - Hoffenheim
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Pregled Rally: Portugal
programme.desc: Pogledajte pregled najboljih momenata sa ovogodišnjeg izdanja reli trke koja se održava u Portugalu.

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta
programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Etar - Lokomotiv Sofia
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona. (LIVE).

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Botev Vratsa - Hebar
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona. (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Nemačka liga: Chemnitz - Wurzburg
programme.desc: Iz godine u godinu, Bundesliga je jača. Zna se da su Alba i Bajern uvek moćni, ali sada imaju i žestoku konkurenciju.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Schalke - Hansa
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Fudbal - Švajcarska liga: Young Boys - Lugano
programme.desc: Švajcarska Super liga pod tim nazivom se vodi od 2003. godine, dok je prvi prvak okrunjen davne 1898. Prvi prvak i najuspješniji klub sa čak 27 titule je Grasshopper Club Zürich.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...
